Video Games for NEEMO 23

24 May 2019 - Mateo Atwi

At NASA in the Spring of 2019, I was tasked with creating video games to be tested at NEEMO 23. I created two games. The first game used the position telemetry from the MED-2 to map to a character position in the game. The second game received heart rate data from MoBI and used that to control the character’s position vertically.
